      • checkAccessibilityConstraints

        public boolean checkAccessibilityConstraints()
        Check that every city in a state respects the accesibily contraints. A city should have a school or a neighbour school
        Returns:
        Check status

        Parameters:

      • solve

        public void solve()
        Automatically, alter cities of the state so that we have the least count of schools and every city respects the accessibility constraints
